attributes.action: hold the Iraq War inquiry in public, and reporting prior to the May '09
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is not acceptable for the government to hold this inquiry behind closed doors; the British public will not stand for it. Hundreds of British dead and hundreds of thousands of Iraqi dead are too important for this not to be discussed in public. The public have no trust left in the government to conduct the proceedings in secret.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
